title: Beautiful Destruction
description: I’ve fallen for a guy I can never have. A guy whose gaze lingers longer than it should, and his touch scorches my skin. I’ve crossed a line with Carter that we can never come back from. I’m his completely. Too bad he’s my stepbrother, and he’s off-limits. CONTAINS: STEPBROTHER, VIRGIN Beautiful Destruction is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
